title: New Mimic View
content:
<path d="M50,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#EEE" />
<g animation='scaleY' ep='Toto' domain='137,140' fixed='bottom'>
  <path d="M50,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#A49" />
</g>
<g animation='translateY' ep='Toto' domain='137,140' width='160' direction='top'>
  <path d="M46,181 l24,0 l0,-2 l-24,0 z" style=" fill: #666" />
</g>
<g x='40' y='200' animation='textBox' ep='Toto' textcolor='0$#00F;139$#F00' bgcolor='0$#FFF;139$#FDD'>-</g>

<path d="M100,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#EEE" />
<g animation='scaleY' ep='Titi' domain='117,121' fixed='bottom'>
  <path d="M100,180 l16,0 l0,-160 l-16,0 z" style=" fill:#5C2" />
</g>
<g animation='translateY' ep='Titi' domain='117,121' width='160' direction='top'>
  <path d="M96,181 l24,0 l0,-2 l-24,0 z" style=" fill: #666" />
</g>
<g x='90' y='200' animation='textBox' ep='Titi' textcolor='0$#00F;118$#F00' bgcolor='0$#FFF;118$#FDD'>-</g>

<path d="M200,90 l160,0 l0,-16 l-160,0 z" style=" fill:#EEE" />
<g animation='scaleX' ep='Titi' domain='117,120' fixed='left'>
  <g animation='colour' ep='Titi' operators='<=$119$#8AE*>$118$#45C'>
    <path d="M200,90 l160,0 l0,-16 l-160,0 z" style=" fill:#67D" />
  </g>
</g>
<g animation='translateX' ep='Titi' domain='117,120' width='160' direction='right'>
  <path d="M199,94 l2,0 l0,-24 l-2,0 z" style=" fill: #666" />
</g>
<g x='284' y='111' animation='textBox' ep='Titi' textcolor='0$#00F;118$#F00' bgcolor='0$#FFF;118$#FDD'>-</g>
<text x="220" y="110" fill="#666" style="font-weight:bold;">EP [ Titi ] : </text>

<path d="M200,40 l160,0 l0,-4, l-160,0 z" style=" fill: #EEE; stroke: #CCC;" />
<g animation='translateX' ep='Titi' domain='117,121' width='160'>
  <ellipse cx="200" cy="38" rx="8" ry="8" style="fill: #DDD; stroke: #CCC;" />
</g>
